de.bit.pl02.pp5.task01

Class CommandLineInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bit.pl02.pp5.task01.CommandLineInterface

  • public class CommandLineInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Main Class to interact with the user and receive input through command line options.
    Author:
    Shreya Kapoor, Sophia Krix, Gemma van der Voort

    • Field Detail

      • cmd

        static org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmd
        The command line to receive arguments from the user, static method because at once only one command line will run from this class.

      • error_code

        public static int error_code
        To keep a track of certain errors throughout the program 1. Means that the metafile didn't exist and the program made it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandLineInterface

        public CommandLineInterface()

    • Method Detail

      • checkmetafile

        public static java.io.File checkmetafile(java.lang.String filename)
        Checks if a metadata file exists already, otherwise creates a new metadata file with the same name as the image file and stores it with an extension .meta
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the input file
        Returns:
        file if the oldfile exists return it else return newfile

      • getMetaUser

        public static void getMetaUser(java.io.File file,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> array,
                               java.lang.Boolean overwrite)
        Get input from the user about author, title and infographic as a tuple, separated by a comma. Saves a .txt file of the metadata. If a file does not already exist, create a new file if a file exists add contents to that one
        Parameters:
        file - the metadata returned file
        array - contains the attributes which are a present in the metadata file already
        overwrite - if the user wants to overwrite the contents of the file or not

      • make_options

        public static org.apache.commons.cli.Options make_options()
        Creates command line options to make a database, store images in it and retrieve image and metadata information
        Returns:
        options the command line options

      • parse_commandline

        public static org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine parse_commandline(org.apache.commons.cli.Options options,
                                                                   java.lang.String[] args)
        Parses command line options for arguments and returns the corresponding options and values. Exits the application if the input file is not found.
        Parameters:
        options - the command line options
        args - the values of the command line options
        Returns:
        cmd list of atomic option and value tokens

      • readfile

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readfile(java.io.File file)
                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads an input file and prints the content if option "p" is specified
        Parameters:
        file - the file of the input picture
        Returns:
        array the list of what metadata content is already present and might be overwritten
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - the metadata file didnt exist before

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
